name: SubsPlease DarkGreen
description:
A green-accented dark mode for the SubsPlease website. Some variables such as colors and border radius are tweakable at the top of the stylesheet.

<strike>For best results flip their dark mode switch to change the discord embed dark.</strike>
No longer necessary.
